Package de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.actuator.declarative

Class DeclarativeEndpointInfoTransformer

java.lang.Object
de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.actuator.declarative.DeclarativeEndpointInfoTransformer
public class DeclarativeEndpointInfoTransformer extends Object
Util transformer class with methods for transforming framework declarative objects to their corresponding POJO forms used for exposing its values.
